text: The University of Siena (, UNISI) is in Siena, Italy. It was created in 1240. It is one of the oldest European universities and the 4th oldest in Italy. As of 2011, the university had about 17,290 students."Osservatorio - Didattica studenti" sul sito del MIUR == References == ==Other websites== *University of Padua Website *Museums of the University Siena Category:Sienna Category:1240s establishments in Europe Category:13th-century establishments in Italy
title: University of Siena
